rules_text:
Skulk
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Patty, Youthful Theif attacks and isn't blocked, you and the defending player create a tapped Treasure token.
[i]Balmung[/i] – Patty can't be blocked except by creatures with haste.
Partner with Daisy, Spirited Lifter [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Daisy into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
